analysis.description: RESHToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol#321-328) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol:
	Contract RESHToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

RESHToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol#298-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol#300)

RESHToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol#321-328)
	- /unique_chucks/12/0xbf85479abcf60328cd7224f43ecd71e2f9a282f8.sol#326-327
